name: MIDWEST DAIRY COALITION
sampleDescriptions:
Margin Protection Program reform- for 2018 Farm Bill debate; 
Expanding Risk Management Program options for dairy farmers

In the context of Tax reform proposals, talking about the importance of continued deductibility of interest expenses for dairy farmers and their cooperatives.  

Support for Domestic Production Activi
Fiscal Year 2018 Agriculture Appropriations bills and Supplemental Appropriations bill- proposals to reform Margin Protection Program and expand dairy risk management options
